class.rdfs:comment: An order is a confirmation of a transaction (a receipt), which can contain multiple line items, each represented by an Offer that has been accepted by the customer.
class.rdfs:label: Order

schema:acceptedOffer.rdfs:comment: The offer(s) -- e.g., product, quantity and price combinations -- included in the order.
schema:acceptedOffer.rdfs:label: acceptedOffer

schema:billingAddress.rdfs:comment: The billing address for the order.
schema:billingAddress.rdfs:label: billingAddress

schema:broker.rdfs:comment: An entity that arranges for an exchange between a buyer and a seller.  In most cases a broker never acquires or releases ownership of a product or service involved in an exchange.  If it is not clear whether an entity is a broker, seller, or buyer, the latter two terms are preferred.
schema:broker.rdfs:label: broker

schema:confirmationNumber.rdfs:comment: A number that confirms the given order or payment has been received.
schema:confirmationNumber.rdfs:label: confirmationNumber

schema:customer.rdfs:comment: Party placing the order or paying the invoice.
schema:customer.rdfs:label: customer

schema:discountCode.rdfs:comment: Code used to redeem a discount.
schema:discountCode.rdfs:label: discountCode

schema:discountCurrency.rdfs:comment: The currency of the discount.\n\nUse standard formats: [ISO 4217 currency format](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217), e.g. "USD"; [Ticker symbol](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_cryptocurrencies) for cryptocurrencies, e.g. "BTC"; well known names for [Local Exchange Trading Systems](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Local_exchange_trading_system) (LETS) and other currency types, e.g. "Ithaca HOUR".
schema:discountCurrency.rdfs:label: discountCurrency

schema:isGift.rdfs:comment: Indicates whether the offer was accepted as a gift for someone other than the buyer.
schema:isGift.rdfs:label: isGift

schema:orderDelivery.rdfs:comment: The delivery of the parcel related to this order or order item.
schema:orderDelivery.rdfs:label: orderDelivery

schema:orderStatus.rdfs:comment: The current status of the order.
schema:orderStatus.rdfs:label: orderStatus

schema:partOfInvoice.rdfs:comment: The order is being paid as part of the referenced Invoice.
schema:partOfInvoice.rdfs:label: partOfInvoice

schema:paymentDue.rdfs:comment: The date that payment is due.
schema:paymentDue.rdfs:label: paymentDue

schema:paymentDueDate.rdfs:comment: The date that payment is due.
schema:paymentDueDate.rdfs:label: paymentDueDate

schema:paymentMethod.rdfs:comment: The name of the credit card or other method of payment for the order.
schema:paymentMethod.rdfs:label: paymentMethod

schema:paymentMethodId.rdfs:comment: An identifier for the method of payment used (e.g. the last 4 digits of the credit card).
schema:paymentMethodId.rdfs:label: paymentMethodId

schema:paymentUrl.rdfs:comment: The URL for sending a payment.
schema:paymentUrl.rdfs:label: paymentUrl

schema:seller.rdfs:comment: An entity which offers (sells / leases / lends / loans) the services / goods.  A seller may also be a provider.
schema:seller.rdfs:label: seller
